name: Tumblr - Midnight Chrome Dashboard
description:
Professional looking theme for the Tumblr dashboard

My tumblr: http://stinking.tumblr.com

Check out my new animated apocalypse theme!: http://userstyles.org/styles/92681/

Something on the theme broken or not looking great? Check for updates through the Stylish extension, if it hasn't been fixed yet feel free to inform me of the problem in the Discussions at the bottom. I'll get back to you asap

user.name: mlg
user.about:
I'm an artist not a coder and I code off the top of my head, so my 'styles' may be a little messy.
[I will try to update my styles when I can, however, I'm an undergrad student with not a lot of spare time]

additional_info:
UPDATES

If you spot anything that looks off or like it's a little messed up, please don't hesitate to contact me below, I'll get back to you as soon as I can [I'm a busy full-time student :)]

August 2015
- Fixes to code that's stopped working with recent tumblr updates

May 2015
- Updated for the newer dashboard look

March 2015
- Spring cleaning on the code! [I finally tidied all my super messy coding so now it's easier for you guys to edit as you please]
- Style fixes and improvements
- New audio player look
(This version currently works best in chrome as the public release of Firefox doesn't support some CSS yet)

31 October 2014
Updated to match recent tumblr dashboard update

12 March 2014
~A few fixes including the search page

07 November 2013
~Aesthetic fixes

06 November 2013
~Updated for newer dashboard

18 October 2013
~Updated for new dashboard look

26 August 2013
~More xKit icons fixes (I apologise for multiple updates in a day)
~Fixed drop-down menu at the top of Activity page

23 August 2013
~xKit icon fixes

21 August 2013
~Updated icons on posts (bottom right) to the original style before the recent most dashboard update
~Removed the separators at the top and bottom of each post

19 July 2013
~Updated for new activity tab

01 July 2013
~Fixed the arrows [top-left] on the posts to match the rest of the theme

07 June 2013
~Matched the style of the post deletion confirmation box to the theme

03 June 2013
~Changed quote post's text colour to make them readable 

30 May 2013
~Updated to work with the new layout of the posts

13 May 2013
~Adjusted text for easier reading
~Adding backgrounds in post editing tools for easier reading

08 March 2013
~Fixed the case of the missing return-to-top button.

03 February 2013
~New log in page!
~Removed that annoying blue gradient under the radar (finally!)

26 January 2013
~Fixed to work with new posting, reblogging and editing style.

discussions.name: Just a few issues but looks great over all
